All Implemented Interfaces:
Broadcaster, Listener, Repeater, Transceiver, Closeable, Flushable, Operation, Startable, Stoppable, Receiver, Transmitter, NamedObject, AutoCloseable
public class SmtpEmailSender extends EmailSender
Sends emails via SMTP using a host, username and password.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
